summary: Design and build a modern, mobile-friendly, authentic local café website for Royal Cafe (Varpur, Mau, Uttar Pradesh) with a warm/royal cozy aesthetic, clear CTA, menu, gallery, testimonials, and contact/location details including embedded Google Map.
architectural_notes: Prioritize mobile-first responsive layout and performance since most visitors will be on phones.
Use authentic, local-feeling imagery (avoid overly generic stock look).
Site should maintain a cozy + royal color palette: warm tones with a touch of elegance.
Hero section: add an additional CTA button placed below “Visit Us” labeled “Order by JD” linking to the JustDial ordering page.
Hero section: add another CTA button beside “Order by JD” labeled “Order by call” linking to tel:+919450814050.
Admin login/editor access: define how the login code (275101MAU) is validated and ensure it is not exposed publicly in client-side code.
known_issues: Contact section edit attempt overwrote an existing paragraph element; phone number should be added in a separate place instead of replacing current content.
Admin login: entering the correct code (275101MAU) does not allow access/redirect to the admin editor page.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, mobile-first marketing website for “Royal Cafe, Varpur (Mau, Uttar Pradesh)” with clear scroll navigation between sections: Hero, About, Highlights, Menu, Gallery, Reviews, and Contact/Location.

Implement a coherent visual theme that feels cozy and slightly royal (warm tones with an elegant accent), applied consistently across typography, spacing, buttons, cards, and section backgrounds. Avoid generic template styling.

Build a warm hero section featuring: the café name “Royal Cafe”, the tagline “Fresh Tea, Great Taste, Everyday Moments”, and a clear call-to-action button (primary: “View Menu”; secondary: “Visit Us Today”). Use inviting, local-feeling food/beverage visuals (not overly stock-like).

Add an “About Royal Cafe” section describing what makes it special in Varpur: quality taste, friendly atmosphere, affordable pricing, and comfortable seating for friends/family. Keep copy simple, honest, and easy to scan.

Add a “Popular Picks” (highlights) section that showcases key categories/items: tea, coffee, snacks, fast food, and optional specials. Present as a small grid of cards with short descriptions and (optional) price placeholders that can be easily edited later.

Create a clean, easy-to-scan Menu section with grouped categories (e.g., Tea, Coffee, Snacks, Fast Food). Include item names and optional price placeholders (clearly indicated as editable) and ensure the layout is optimized for phone viewing.
Add a small Gallery section showing café interior, food/drinks, and happy customers. Use a responsive grid with an accessible image modal/lightbox or enlarged view on tap.
Add a Reviews/Testimonials section showing positive local feedback (3–6 testimonials) with names/initials and short quotes. Keep wording authentic and simple (no exaggerated marketing claims).

Add a Contact & Location section that clearly displays: location in “Varpur, Mau, Uttar Pradesh”, business hours, and contact details. Include an embedded Google Map (iframe) for navigation plus a backup “Open in Google Maps” link.
Ensure the overall experience is fast and mobile-friendly: responsive layout, optimized images, accessible headings/contrast, and basic SEO metadata (page title/description).
Remove the Gallery section from the page layout so it is no longer rendered between the Menu and Reviews sections.
Remove the Gallery entry from the top navigation so users cannot navigate/scroll to a non-existent `#gallery` section.
Remove any footer 'Gallery' quick link and clean up unused Gallery data/code so the build has no unused Gallery references.

Update the Contact & Location section data so the displayed phone number is exactly “+91 94508 14050”, and ensure it appears as its own phone line in the Contact card (not replacing/overwriting any existing paragraph text such as the location address or other copy).
Add the Instagram profile link https://www.instagram.com/royal_cafe_mau/ to the site’s social section(s) and ensure it is reachable via an Instagram icon/link.
Remove the Facebook option/link from the site’s social/contact areas so Facebook is no longer shown as an available social platform.

Add a third call-to-action button in the Hero section directly below the existing “Visit Us Today” button, labeled exactly “Order by JD”, and configure it to open the following JustDial link in a new browser tab: https://www.justdial.com/Mau/Royal-Cafe-Varpur/9999PX547-X547-230912003001-Y2A5_BZDET?trkid=&term=&ncatid=11988211&area=&search=Royal%20Cafe%20in%20Mau%20-%20Order%20Food%20Online&mncatname=Royal%20Cafe&ftterm=&abd_btn=&abd_heading=&bd=1&cat_b2b_flag=0&searchfrom=lst&thumbnail=

In the Hero section CTA area, add a new button labeled exactly "Order by call" positioned beside the existing "Order by JD" button, and configure it to open the device phone dialer using a `tel:` link for the phone number "+91 94508 14050".
Add an admin login entry point to the Royal Cafe website that allows an administrator to enter the login code "275101MAU" and, on success, access an admin-only editor page.

Create an admin-only Editor page that allows updating the site’s editable content currently defined in the frontend content source (highlights, menu categories/items, testimonials, and contact info), and persist those edits so they remain after page reload.

Fix the admin authentication flow so that entering the correct admin code "275101MAU" actually authorizes the current caller and allows access to the admin-only editor page (no AccessDenied screen after successful login).

Frontend: update AdminLoginDialog to perform admin login against the backend (instead of only local string-checking) and to refresh the cached admin status query after a successful login so NavBar/App editor gating works reliably.

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage hero section with Royal Cafe name, tagline, and clear call-to-action (e.g., Visit Us Today / View Menu) using inviting local-looking visuals and cozy/royal color palette
About/intro section describing what makes Royal Cafe special in Varpur (quality taste, friendly atmosphere, affordable pricing, comfortable seating)
Highlight popular items (tea, coffee, snacks, fast food, specials if available) in a simple, easy-to-read section
Reviews/testimonials section featuring positive local feedback
Contact/location section with address (Varpur, Mau), business hours, contact details, and embedded Google Map
Fast, mobile-friendly responsive design optimized for phone visitors
Add phone number +91 94508 14050 to the Contact/Location section as a separate line/field (do not overwrite existing paragraph/text)
Add Instagram link/ID (https://www.instagram.com/royal_cafe_mau/) to the site and remove the Facebook option/link from social/contact areas
Add a new CTA button below the existing “Visit Us” button labeled “Order by JD” that opens the provided JustDial order link
Add a CTA button beside “Order by JD” labeled exactly “Order by call” that opens the phone dialer (tel:) for +91 94508 14050
Add an admin login option that unlocks/opens an editor page for the site using a login code (provided: 275101MAU)
Implement Motoko backend support for admin code verification, admin session state, and storing/loading the editable site content as stable data.

Backend: expose an admin-status API used by the frontend and ensure it behaves consistently with content update authorization (i.e., the same rule that allows updateHomePageContent must also make isCallerAdmin return true).
